pre_animation: variable.hand_bob = query.life_time < 0.01 ? 0.0 : variable.hand_bob + ((query.is_on_ground && query.is_alive ? math.clamp(math.sqrt(math.pow(query.position_delta(0), 2.0) + math.pow(query.position_delta(2), 2.0)), 0.0, 0.1) : 0.0) - variable.hand_bob) * 0.02;

variable.crosshair_pistol = query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'glock17' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'glock19' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'baretta_92fs' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'dbs' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'flare_gun';

variable.pistol = query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'glock17' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'glock19' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'baretta_92fs' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'flare_gun' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'dbs' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'flash_light';

variable.assult = query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'scar_h_sand'|| query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'scar_h_black'|| query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'flamethrower' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'm416' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'awm';

variable.assult_walking = query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'scar_h_sand'|| query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'scar_h_black'|| query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'flamethrower' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'm416' || query.get_equipped_item_name('main_hand') == 'awm';
